title: Cool Mint Nicotine Pouches by Ace
description: TRY ACE COOL MINT NICOTINE POUCHES Cool Mint Nicotine Pouches by Ace feature a burst of cool mint flavour and sweet peppermint that will provide you with an unbeatable experience. Ace Superwhite Cool Mint is a super soft nicotine pouch with a long-lasting flavour of chilly mint together with a stronger taste of peppermint. View all Ace Nicotine Pouches View all Mint/Menthol Pouches View all Stong Pouches View all Medium Pouches KEY FEATURES: Cool mint and Peppermint flavoured nicotine pouches Designed for a strong nicotine kick Great substitute for cigarettes Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 16MG Per Gram | 9.6MG Per Pouch MORE ABOUT PEPPERMINT FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES Ace's Cool Mint nicotine pouches feature a real kick with their high nicotine content and intense menthol flavour. These pouches aren't for newbies and are suitable for experience nicotine pouch users. MORE ABOUT NICOTINE POUCHES Ace's tobacco-free, slim nicotine pouches are perfect for discreet usage. Each pouch fits securely under your lip, offering you a discreet and effective nicotine experience. Ace's pouches are for experienced users and are available in a range of flavours, so make sure you check out the rest of the range. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Ace Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Slim Our Strength Rating: Strong Nicotine per (mg/Gram) 16MG Nicotine per Pouch (mg/pouch) 9.6 MG Flavour Name: Cool Mint Flavour: Cool mint and peppermint Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
